name: Carcass to be tagged
text: §183D-36  Carcass to be tagged.  Any licensee may possess, transport, or sell any game bird brought into the State or raised in captivity within the State as set forth in this section.  The carcasses of the game birds may be possessed, transported, or sold at any time, if tagged as directed by the department with an indestructible tag or seal to be supplied by the department to the licensee upon payment of the actual cost. [L 1985, c 174, pt of §4]
